participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and creative, loves to dance and reminisce about childhood.
participant_1.background: i love new kids on the block. my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i was born in the early 80 s. i also like old school hip hop. i take dance lessons once a week.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and friendly, enjoys meeting new people and sharing stories.
participant_2.background: my favourite music is country music. i am a convenience store manager. i met taylor swift. i drive a nissan pathfinder. i've short brown hair.
